title: Saudi Arabia Seaside Escape with Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Nestled along the Red Sea coastline, this hotel offers a serene seaside retreat that blends business convenience with relaxation. Discover spacious rooms designed for modern comfort and functionality, ideal for both work and rest. Unwind with a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or savour ocean views from the stylish terrace, where you can kick back and enjoy the sea breeze.

With easy access to the city’s vibrant commercial districts, stunning beaches and historic landmarks, Novotel Yanbu provides the perfect base for both business and leisure. Whether you’re snorkelling in crystal-clear waters or immersing yourself in the local culture, this coastal gem offers the best of both worlds.
offer_address: Prince Abdulmagid Bin Abdulaziz King Abdulmajid Corniche Road, Yanbu 41912, Saudi Arabia
